wpt.name: GCHC2K
wpt.desc: Dave'sDoin's by OTTERMEN EMPIRE, Traditional Cache (1/1)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Dave'sDoin's
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: A guick and easy micro in a small park in Charlestown Township.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
This cache was placed in honor of the completion of Dave's Boy Scout "Eagle Project". Congrats! It's a short walk along a paved trail to the cache site. Parking is available at N 40d 07.274 S 075d 33.209. Remember, it's a micro with no writing implement so BYOP, and as always...."Be Prepared".
02/21/11: I have just been informed that there is a lock and lock box very near to our micro cache. After a bit of research, I have discovered that the box is, in fact, a letterbox not a geocache. If you find that, don't log it as a find for Dave'sDoin's. The cache is close by, but it is a micro with it's own log. A bit trickier to find.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: We needed some looking to find this one, and some care to avoid poison ivy, but we got it.
